argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_limord | |- ( Lim A -> Ord A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_elong | |- ( A e. B -> ( A e. On <-> Ord A ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl5ibr | |- ( A e. B -> ( Lim A -> A e. On ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_imp | |- ( ( A e. B /\ Lim A ) -> A e. On ) |
